name: Douglas Owusu Bisiw
body:
## Bonjour , Hi ! 

I'm a freelance web developer based in Montreal and also an e-reporter for [Korea-Canada 50th anniversary](http://korcan50years.com/). I have bachelor in Computer Science and I am currently pursuing master of Engineering in information systems security at Concordia University.  I presently work on web application projects putting together the best of security and usability. I do projects on both Microsoft and open source platforms. My specialities are PHP, JAVA, MySQL database security, cryptography, Internet forensic analysis. You can learn more about me from my [LinkedIn Profile](http://lnkd.in/mv2cMB).

## Projects:

A few of my projects: [MyeCommerce](https://github.com/dbisiw07/myEcomerce),[Gestion de bibliotheque](https://github.com/dbisiw07/LibraryManager), [Role Based Access Control System](https://github.com/dbisiw07/RBAC)

You can check out more of my projects on my [Git hub Profile](https://github.com/dbisiw07) 

## Contact Me:

email: dbisiw07 (at) gmail (dot) com
